items.name: Ferrero Rocher
items.desc: Ferrero Rocher is a chocolate and hazelnut product produced by the Italian confectionery company Ferrero.

items.name: Sebamed Facewash
items.desc: Sebamed Clear Face Foam facewash is a good product to include as a part of your acne care regime. It is soap free and paraben free.

items.name: Apple
items.desc: An apple is an edible fruit produced by an apple tree (Malus domestica). Apple trees are cultivated worldwide and are the most widely grown species in the genus Malus.

items.name: Coke
items.desc: Coca-Cola, or Coke, is a carbonated soft drink manufactured by The Coca-Cola Company. Originally marketed as a temperance drink and intended as a patent medicine, it was invented in the late 19th century

items.name: Epigamia Yogurt
items.desc: Epigamia is India's first all-natural Greek yogurt. It is thick and creamy in texture, low in fat and high in protein.
